thread.title: Ryanair Celebrates Record Facebook FollowersTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Ryanair Celebrates Record Facebook FollowersTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Ryanair Celebrates Record Facebook Followers
Ryanair, Europe’s favourite airline, today (20 Aug) celebrated reaching a record 250,000 Facebook followers in just 6 weeks and urged fans to enter its ‘30 Names 30 Planes’ competition, as entries draw to a close.
Ryanair’s Facebook page features the latest route news and developments as they happen, great competitions and offers, and real-time customer service, in addition to its growing Twitter, YouTube, Instagram, LinkedIn and Google+ pages.
As part of its 30 th birthday celebrations, Ryanair has launched a ‘30 Names 30 Planes’ competition, offering 30 fans the chance to have their name and face pictured on one of 30 Ryanair aircraft. Entry is only through the Ryanair Facebook page, where fans can upload their photo and download a CGI video of their own Ryanair plane bearing their name and face, and the competition closes at 9pm on Monday, 31 st August.
Ryanair’s Head of Communications, Robin Kiely said:
“We’re pleased to have attracted a quarter of a million followers in the six weeks since we joined Facebook, on the day we celebrated the 30 th anniversary of our first flight, and we look forward to bringing more great offers, content and competitions to our fans.
30 lucky fans will have their name and face pictured on one of 30 Ryanair aircraft and we’ve had thousands of ‘30 Names 30 Planes’ entries so far. There’s still time to enter, with the competition closing on Monday, 31 st August and the winners will be announced in September.”
Source:- Ryanair
